title: Find your belongings
content:
Find your Belongings Type Quest Chapter 1 Location Druid Grove Reward

Find your Belongings

Find your Belongings is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find your Belongings can be acquired during Chapter 1.

Find your Belongings Objectives

Speak to the thieves. Find the thieves' hideout. Find our stolen belongings. Check the pickpocket's bag.

Find your Belongings Walkthrough

You can learn the entrance to Tiefling Hideout by talking to Doni after completing the quest Investigate the Beach.

How to un
